title: 06/04/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/04/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the Lakers future after getting eliminated from the playoffs and why the problem is not easy to fix. He explains why the Trail Blazers need to make a big move this off season in order to finally support Damian Lillard in the prime of his career. He also defends LeBron James from the criticism he’s getting for losing in the first round of the playoffs and why it has no impact on his legacy. Plus, 3-time NBA Champion BJ Armstrong joins the show to put LeBron’s legacy in perspective compared to his former teammate Michael Jordan.
